lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: It's a good thing to do and my sister-in-law gave me the info.

lender.name: Mohamed

lender.name: Ester

lender.occupational_info: Teaching language and art feels like you are opening the door to many countries, many cultures to the children. Make them see that difference is part of our world. Understand it and respect it.

lender.name: Bree
lender.loan_because: Being a business owner myself, I can understand the struggles and tribulations of starting a business. But I can only imagine the difficulties it would be for someone in a country where money and resources are very limited. The more you help others, the better you feel! And the better you feel, the more wonderful your life will be!

lender.loan_because: Everybody can contribute to fight poverty! Teach my kids how bad the situation is for poor people, educate them on this important issue.

lender.loan_because: I wish to help women less fortunate than myself to empower themselves and to educate their children.
lender.occupational_info: Education in the fields of communication, speech, drama and dance. I work mainly with young children.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: I believe we all have a responsibility to facilitate each other in whatever way we can and whenever we can. Charity although helpful has its limits, whereas microfinance is more than an economic resource it also gives the recipient a sense of worth, responsibility and the opportunity to take control of their own destiny. Something we in the West take for granted.
lender.occupational_info: Teach at a University

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I enjoy the idea of my money making a positive difference in someone's life. God has blessed me to have a little money left over, so figured I would bless others with it

lender.name: Kevin Magee
lender.loan_because: I believe that having the courage to create, the tenacity to succeed and the drive to make ones dreams manifest are the foundations of a successful business, a fulfilling life and a better world. lender.occupational_info: I teach graphic art to college students.

lender.occupational_info: I maintain the financial accounts for over 80 independent researchers at the University of Pittsburgh, within the Clinical and Translational Science Institute. I am also a fiction writer.

lender.name: Rob

lender.occupational_info: I teach at the most famous university in England. I teach computing and engineering of very large technology.

lender.name: MARI
lender.loan_because:
I believe that generally, people will 'live up to' a community's expectations for them. Thus, firmly believing someone will succeed generally leads to success as long as their community (family, friends, or even a global community) voices the expectation and provides direct or indirect support. Likewise, expecting someone to fail generally leads to failure. I believe that researched goals, firm plans, hard work, tenacity, are the keys to success. I also believe that reaching out our hand to help others is both our reward for succeeding and our responsibility no matter where we are in our attainment of success.
I loan because I believe in humanity.

lender.name: Cristiana
lender.loan_because: If I were ever in need I would want someone to help me.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse.... I believe that everyone can make a difference in the world one step at a time. A good wish does not change much a good decision changes everything!

Definition A Protection Operative could also be described as: VIP Protection specialist, Close Protection specialist , Personal Protection specialist , Executive Protection specialist, Bodyguard and Personal Security Detail (PSD) He is the person responsible for protecting VIPs and Assets.Special note We believe that the VIP Protection branch is the most important in the security field, it requires the highest level of skills, know-how, practical experience, quality of people and seriousness of all the various security fields, especially because the danger to a human life is the gravest and most immediate.Our graduates who work in the field of sensitive Installation's Security or Securing Valuables in transit or other Assets will be able to do so very efficiently, without any further training. DeutschRussianSpanish
Our Graduates are more recognized, respected and sought after by Distinguish Protection service "consumers" and by most of the "Providers" of Protection services worldwide.

lender.name: Kate
lender.occupational_info: Taking a story, whether written or verbal, and transforming it into a moving picture - a visual adventure. Something that is timeless and overcomes all language barriers. Something that can be watched over and over in all areas of the world. Making movies!

lender.name: ISR Duri
lender.loan_because: We are a P-8 private international school in Sumatra, Indonesia that is committed to nurturing our students to be global stewards.
lender.occupational_info: Working together to improve the world.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to develop their own sustainable business instead of just waiting for charity.
lender.occupational_info:
Zwei grundlegende Probleme sehe ich bei der Atomkraftnutzung:
Das erste Problem ist der Mensch selbst. Wo Menschen arbeiten, passieren Fehler und Selbstüberschätzungen, früher oder später, unvermeidlich. Tote im Straßenverkehr, ärztliche Kunstfehler, Finanzkrisen.
Ein schwerer Störfall bei einem Atomkraftwerk nur alle hunderttausend Jahre (auch das eine menschliche Einschätzung, s.o.)? Wie schnell tausend Jahre vorbei sein können, hat man in der Geschichte doch schon öfters gesehen.
Und die möglichen Folgen sind nahezu unbegrenzt. Wir spielen "Alles oder Nichts".
Das zweite Problem ist der radioaktive Abfall. Die sichere Lagerung über Jahrhunderttausende ist gnadenloser (Selbst)betrug. (Etwas von Problem 1 steckt hier auch noch mit drin.)
Als Ausgleich für diese Bedrohungen wird nun (März 2010) eine Abschöpfung eines Teils - vielleicht der Hälfte - der zusätzlichen Gewinne (geschätzt 400 - 800 Mio. pro AKW und Jahr) für die "Energieforschung" in die Diskussion gebracht.
Das hört sich ja super an, für 2,50 - 5,00 € pro Bundesbürger und Jahr für jedes Kernkraftwerk sollen wir prinzipiell unbegrenzte Risiken tragen und die Büchse der Pandora mit noch mehr Atommüll füllen?
Ich weiß wirklich nicht, was diese Volksvertreter umtreibt und hoffe, dass dieser Wahnsinn jetzt endlich ein Ende findet.
Es läßt sich doch auch niemand für einen Euro ein paar Tage lang irgendwo auf Bahngeleise ketten - selbst wenn die Schienen rostig sind!
Thomas
Im übrigen bin ich der Meinung, dass alle Atomkraftwerke so schnell wie möglich abgeschaltet werden müssen.

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for the opportunities I have been given and would like to help others accomplish their goals through this program.
lender.occupational_info: I assist companies with their accounting, financial reporting and financing needs.

lender.name: Jac
lender.loan_because: Money, like life, has an ebb and flow. What goes out eventually comes back ready to be sent out again and again. Kiva helps it to keep flowing around the world.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: We are so lucky in many parts of the West just to be born where we were. If we happened to be born in the developing world, we wouldn't have nearly the opportunities that we do. I love the thought of entrepreneurs all over the world using capital that we can make available to better their lives.

lender.occupational_info: I coordinate the Kiva process between EDESA (Kiva Field Partner) and Comunal Credit Enterprise (CCEs) throughout Costa Rica.

lender.name: Ramone

Although Kiva is not perfect its a step in the right direction and I feel privileged to be able to contribute to the cause.
